DOC.brief_summary: In previous study investigator find CoQ10 improve cholesterol efflux macrophage cell model , ApoE mouse model small-scale healthy volunteer . In addition , CoQ10 strong antioxidant activity essential factor mitochondrion electron transport chain . So investigator hypothesize CoQ10 may health promotion effect dyslipidemia , risk factor atherosclerosis cardiovascular disease . On purpose , investigator go recruit 150 dyslipidemia patient supply CoQ10+vitamin E CoQ10 alone placebo different dos 24 week explore effect CoQ10 cholesterol efflux lipid profile dyslipidemia .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Dietary Supplement Coenzyme Q10（CoQ10） Dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: The subject consider dyslipidemia meet 2 follow 4 criterion : fasting total cholesterol concentration > 200 mg/dL , fast triglyceride concentration > 150mg/dL , fast LDLcholesterol concentration > 100 mg/dL , fast HDLcholesterol concentration > 40 mg/dL . history CVD severe chronic disease use drug know affect lipid metabolism . use antioxidant Vitamin E , vitamin C , Phytochemicals coenzyme Q10 within two month trial . pregnant lactating woman
